{{cpp/utility/bitset/title|size}}
{{cpp/utility/bitset/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcla|noexcept=c++11|constexpr=c++11|1=
std::size_t size() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the number of bits that the bitset holds.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
number of bits that the bitset holds, i.e. the template parameter {{tt|N}}.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;bitset&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::bitset&lt;0x400&gt;().size() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=1024
}}
